review.name: Joshua Kim
review.review: My favorite burger that is on the menu, you can get this with a side of fries and a coke for such a cheap price. This burger tops their McChicken and McNuggets any day :)!

review.name: Victor Rolnaldo
review.review: Do not get this burger!!! It came out raw in the middle and the server did not give me a new one when I asked for one medium rare. Maybe it was in the moment but I did not have a good time with this one.

review.name: Jennie Kim
review.review: AMAZINGGggg! 10/10 would order again. Probably the best meal I had in ages.

review.name: Bill Gates
review.review: Decent burger with enough meat and vegetables as a balance. Always great with the fries and a soda on the side. Would get this again as a midnight snack.
